Pools appear as indispensable parts of many homes. So what types of tiles are used in pools? Or which types should you prefer? You have more options than you think. We will tell you about swimming pool tiles in our article.

You Can Decide According To The Size!

When choosing the tiles of your pool, you can decide according to the size. There are many sizes to choose from. Generally, larger tiles are cheaper, while smaller tiles can be slightly more expensive. It is entirely up to you to decide according to your budget.

  • 6 "x 6" pool tile: This size is the largest among the standard options. The cost will be lower when you choose because you don't need to buy many tiles. This is the most commonly used size in swimming pools. It is possible to show your pool more comprehensively than it is by choosing large tiles. Moreover, you can find this dimension in different materials.
  • 3 "x 3" pool tile: You can find many options in this size as well. For example, a blue pool tile might be an option.
  • 2 "x 2" pool tile: If you are looking for an affordable option, this might be for you. You can choose a tile made of ceramic or porcelain.
  • 1 "x 1" pool tile: This is a suitable size for those who want to add a dramatic effect. Moreover, most of them are made of glass and will last a long time.

You Can Also Make Your Choice According To The Material

The materials will both be priced differently from each other and add different appearances. Here you can choose according to your budget and wishes. We also want to say that you will have a wide range of choices.

Porcelain and ceramic pool tile: Porcelain and ceramic last for a long time, and both are incredibly economical. Moreover, when choosing swimming pool tiles, people mostly prefer porcelain and ceramics.

Stone-like swimming pool tile: This is our suggestion for those who prefer a more elegant and rustic look. Choosing these models allows you to get a very natural look. Moreover, it does not hold moss or dirt.

Glass pool tile: Of course, it is necessary to talk about this when talking about pools. Glass tiles do not have pores and therefore do not hold moss. It is very durable, and you can easily maintain it. The only downside is that it can be costly. However, if the budget is not a problem for you, you can choose it because it will not regret you in the long run.

How Can I Make The Right Choice?

The right choice depends on everyone. What kind of result you want is very important here. At the same time, you should pay attention to your budget. However, we will still have some suggestions for you.

We recommend that you think carefully and research a lot of options before making a decision. You can take advantage of dozens of types on our site. If you wish, you can also get support from us. Try to choose high-quality and moss-free products. It's going to be a pool and lots of fluid, after all. You should choose products that can last for a long time in humid environments. It should also be easy to maintain. Cleaning a pool can be more complex than you think. Products that wear out over time will cost you a lot.

Pool Tiles Suggestions

We have made many suggestions for you, but we still have things to say. There is a tile model that is always in vogue in pools: pool mosaic tiles. Mosaic is preferred. It should be said that it suits the pools very well. A blue mosaic tile can make your pool look very high quality. Swimming pool mosaics may differ from those typically used. However, if you wish, you can also choose a standard blue mosaic. Before choosing, consider your wishes carefully and decide accordingly. The result will only satisfy you then. There is another thing that has been in vogue lately: the black tile pool. It's surprising but true. Especially young people often choose black tile pool. It looks different if you ask us. If you want a stylish look and want to go beyond the standards, your choice may be the black tile pool.

Is Pool Tile Different From Regular Tile?

The answer to this question is an absolute yes because pools have a unique structure. You need to choose a tile that is highly resistant to water and moisture. You cannot choose every color in terms of color. At the same time, it is not considered very suitable for marble pools. It should be easy to clean because pools often get dirty.

Where Can I Find Pool Tile Ideas?

You can find many suggestions in our article, but our site has one more place to look. Our team can assist you.

We want to be with you while choosing the most suitable tile. Of course, you can make a choice based on your wishes and based on our article. You will see that there are dozens of options on our site. You can narrow down the options according to your wishes and get support from us. It is easier to choose pool tile than usual because not all types of tiles are used. At the same time, the colors and models you can use are determined. Once you have determined your budget and your wishes, it will become effortless to choose. Remember that this decision is crucial and maybe you will make a choice once. You can even take a look at how the surroundings of the pool are designed. Think of the overall look, not the pool alone.
